item.title: Haxoring the Chumby: My first thoughts
item.description: So I got a Chumby awhile ago. It is really neat. I fell in love with it immediately. I took it apart, put it back together. I turned on SSH, poked around, played with the insides. I replaced images, replaced flash pieces and then I got real busy. So this weekend I finally got to sit down and get down to the nitty gritty. Well not so nitty gritty - but a bit nitty gritty.
